content:
Based on your usage, it sounds like you're getting close to running low on cat food.

Since it's been 5 weeks since your last order, and a 20-pound bag typically lasts you 4-6 weeks, I'd recommend ordering a new bag soon to avoid running out. You might want to consider placing an order within the next week or so to ensure you don't run out of food for your feline friends.

Keep in mind that this is just an estimate, and the actual duration of the cat food supply may vary depending on factors like your cat's appetite, activity level, and any changes in their eating habits. But as a general rule of thumb, it's better to err on the side of caution and order a new bag when you're getting close to the end of your current supply.

Hope this helps, and happy ordering!
